concept.title: Connecting: Connection to File Server
concept.shortdesc: Describes a simple example connecting to the File Server and retrieving session information.

section.title: Download
section.p: Click on the following link to download the example: Connecting.zip
Click on the following link to download additional files: CommonFramework.zip
Browse Connecting to view the example code.
Browse CommonFramework to view the additional files.

section.title: Description
section.p: Connecting connects to the file server, then retrieves the default session and system paths. It demonstrates what happens to the session path of an existing and a new connection when the system and session paths are changed.

section.title: Running the example
section.p: The code creates a directory called \f32test\ and deletes it before exiting.
